basic_information.scholarship_name: ISM-OKC David Henry Memorial Endowed Scholarship

description: The ISM-OKC David Henry Memorial Endowed Scholarship is open to a declared Operations & Supply Chain Management major, with emphasis in Purchasing & Materials Management / Supply Chain Management. Students must have a minimum 3.25 cumulative GPA and have completed 45 hours at the time of application. Two faculty recommendations required (please indicate the College of Business faculty members on your application that you wish to have supply a recommendation). Eligibility Requirements Declared Operations & Supply Chain Management major Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.25 or higher Completed at least 45 hours Two faculty recommendations required (please indicate the College of Business faculty members on your application that you wish to have supply a recommendation) Selection Process Emphasis in Purchasing & Materials Management / Supply Chain Management
